Phoenix: Young man with dark skin and athletic build. BLACK HAIR in DREADLOCKS with SHAVED SIDES (undercut). Brown eyes, confident smirking expression. Dark skin is key identifier.
Jett: Young woman with fair skin and slender build. SHORT WINDSWEPT WHITE HAIR tied into TOP KNOT. Sharp angular facial features, dark focused eyes. White hair most distinctive.
Reyna: Woman with light brown skin. LONG DARK PURPLE HAIR with GLOWING MAGENTA STREAK in bangs. PIERCING GLOWING PURPLE EYES (most distinctive!). Fierce predatory expression.
Raze: Woman with dark skin and toned build. Dark hair in COILED BUNS, BACKWARD ORANGE BASEBALL CAP covering it. Large headphones around neck. Energetic confident look.
Yoru: Young man with fair skin and lean build. SPIKY DARK BLUE HAIR with LIGHTER BLUE TIPS. Confident smirk. Blue and black mask pushed to side of head.
Neon: Young woman with light brown skin, slim athletic physique. VIBRANT BLUE HAIR with YELLOW UNDERTONES in HIGH PIGTAILS. HORIZONTAL BANDAGE across bridge of nose (very distinctive!).
Iso: Man with fair skin and slender toned build. Dark neatly styled hair FRAMED BY PULSING PURPLE ENERGY. Calm serious intensely focused expression.
Sova: Man with fair skin and muscular build. MEDIUM-LENGTH BLONDE HAIR, blue eyes. GLOWING BLUE BIONIC RIGHT EYE (most distinctive!). Well-defined face, calm focused expression.
Breach: Large heavily muscled man with fair skin. LONG REDDISH-BROWN HAIR tied back. MATCHING FULL BEARD AND MUSTACHE. Light eyes, visible scars. Intense brawny appearance.
Skye: Woman with fair skin and athletic build. REDDISH-BROWN MESSY HAIR held back by GREEN BANDANA. Green eyes, confident rugged expression.
KAY/O: HEAVILY ARMORED ROBOT with humanoid shape. WHITE, BLACK, and BLUE METAL body. SMOOTH WHITE METALLIC HEAD with BLUE LED SCREEN FACE displaying simple lines. Not human!
Fade: Woman with pale skin and slender build. LONG HAIR DISTINCTLY PARTED: BLACK on one side, WHITE on other. HETEROCHROMIA: one BLUE eye, one ORANGE-GOLD eye. Dark ink-like markings under eyes.
Gekko: Young man with light skin and slim build. BRIGHT GREEN BUZZCUT hair. Light-colored beanie, small thin-framed glasses. Friendly youthful appearance.
Brimstone: Older man with light skin, stocky muscular build. SHORT BROWN HAIR, well-groomed BROWN BEARD AND MUSTACHE. DISTINCTIVE ORANGE BERET (key feature!). Commanding stern expression.
Viper: Woman whose features are concealed. Face COMPLETELY HIDDEN by DARK GREEN AND BLACK GAS MASK with GLOWING GREEN LENSES. Black hair visible above mask in bun or braid.
Omen: SPECTRAL FIGURE made of SHADOWS wrapped in GREY BANDAGES. Deep tattered GREY HOOD. Face covered by mask with THREE GLOWING BLUE VERTICAL SLITS only visible feature. Not human!
Astra: Woman with dark skin, tall slender build. Black hair in LARGE TRIANGULAR AFRO-PUFFS adorned with GOLDEN BEADS AND RINGS. Golden dot markings on cheek, nose ring, multiple gold earrings. Regal appearance.
Harbor: Man with brown skin, tall lean build. LONG FLOWING DARK HAIR. Ornate GOLDEN JEWELRY including nose ring and earrings. Charismatic confident expression.
Clove: Young person with slender build and fair skin. Wavy shoulder-length hair in BRIGHT PINK AND PURPLE MIX. Mischievous youthful expression.
Sage: Woman with fair skin, poised slender build. LONG BLACK HAIR in SLEEK HIGH PONYTAIL. Sharp elegant features, dark almond-shaped eyes. Calm serene expression.
Cypher: Man with slender build, IDENTITY COMPLETELY OBSCURED. WIDE-BRIMMED WHITE HAT and BLACK FORM-FITTING FACE MASK. Only visible features: GLOWING CYAN CAMERA-LIKE LENSES on mask.
Killjoy: Young woman with fair skin. SHORT DARK HAIR in BOB. BRIGHT YELLOW BEANIE (signature!). LARGE ROUND GLASSES with YELLOW LENSES. Bright intelligent expression.
Chamber: Man with fair skin, slim sharp build. NEATLY STYLED BROWN HAIR with UNDERCUT. BLACK-RIMMED GLASSES. GOLDEN CIRCUIT-LIKE TATTOO on LEFT TEMPLE (key feature!). Sharp sophisticated expression.
Deadlock: Woman with fair skin, strong athletic build. LONG BRAIDED BLONDE HAIR. Determined expression. Visible SCARS on face. One arm is PROMINENT HIGH-TECH PROSTHETIC (very distinctive!).
